toggle_long_press_to_reorder_widgets: Yambitsani/Letsani kusindikiza kwakutali kuti mukonzenso ma widget

$ai_chat.title: AI Chat Widget
$ai_chat.intro: Moni! Ndine wothandizira ku LLM kwanuko. Ndingakuthandizeni bwanji?
$ai_chat.no_bound_module: Palibe gawo la LLM lomangidwa. Chonde tsegulani zochunira za widget kuti mumange mtundu wachilankhulo.
